Summary.inferences:
• Total support effort peaked in September 2025 
• Regular Maintenance consistently accounts for ~40-50% of monthly effort.
• The highest hours were recorded for issue/bug fixes in November 2025, R&D activities in October 2025, and regular maintenance in September 2025.

cbs changes.inferences:
• CBS-related changes were concentrated in July and October.
• Enhancement requests dominate over bug fixes in CBS scope.
• No CBS activity recorded in May ,November and December.

Master.inferences:
• Regular Maintenance is the largest category, making up ~45% of total effort.
• Issue/Bug resolution shows seasonal spikes.
